about_the_game:
This DLC is packed of a new mercenary and massive precious resources to help with your adventure in Endless World.

Included Items:
- Mercenary Shari, starting with “blood moon”level!
- 2000 Mana Crystals
- 5000 Souls
- 2000 Dark Irons
- 200 Hero Medals
- 3 Time Keys

Shari, a powerful light mage who’s able to manipulate Cookie Puppet to support teammates and fight enemies!

Her abilities are funny but deadly:
- Cookie Factory：Summon a Giant Cookie Puppet who will die after being attacked 6 times. The Giant Cookie Puppet can provides 25% cooldown reduction to all allies. If an ally Giant Cookie Puppet is already summoned, the Giant will summon a small Cookie Puppet.

- Cocoa Sludge：Spray sludge ahead to deal damage for 458% Attack to enemies; If the ally Giant Cookie Puppet has sludge on, it restores 1 hit point and summon a small Cookie Puppet.

- Explosive Candies：Throw a handful of candies into the sky and they will explode when landed, dealing damage for 590% Attack to enemies nearby; If the ally Giant Cookie Puppet is hit by candies, it restores 2 hit point and summon 2 small Cookie Puppets.

- Fruit Jelly：Use jelly to freeze an ally under attack with the lowest Health and the ally Giant Cookie Puppet for 5 sec. The frozen unit(s) will be invincible, restore Health equal to 20% Attack of Shari every sec and deal damage for 295% Attack of Shari to enemies nearby every sec.
